item.title: C#基础——消息
item.description: 重写消息方法 //窗体 捕获消息 const int WM_LBUTTONDOWN = 0x201; protected override void WndProc(ref Message m) { if(m.Msg == WM_LBUTTONDOWN) { Console.WriteLine("WndProc左键按下"); } base.WndProc(ref m); } 进程间通信——发送消息 const int WM_COPYDATA = 0x004A; public struct COPYDATASTRUCT { public IntPtr dwData; public int cbData; [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPStr)] public string lpData; } [DllImport("User32.dll", EntryPoint = "SendMessage")] private static extern int SendMessage( int hWnd, //handle to destination window int Msg, //message int wParam, //first message parameter ref COPYDATASTRUCT IParam //second message parameter ); [DllImport("User32.
